summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hogwarts Music Studio after color theme and feature updates. Frontend design and most features working excellently with beautiful teal/cyan/orange theme. Admin login requires OTP completion, booking form needs multi-step implementation fixes.

critical_bugs.impact: Admin dashboard cannot verify user role properly

authentication_issues.issue: Admin account doesn't exist - requires OTP verification completion
authentication_issues.details: OTP system works, but requires actual email access to complete registration

minor_issues.issue: BSON ObjectId serialization errors in logs

ui_bugs.issue: Missing 3-step process implementation - no step indicators or progression
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot complete multi-step booking process

ui_bugs.issue: Service dropdown not populating with options
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot select services for booking

ui_bugs.issue: Missing Next/Continue buttons for step progression

design_successes.details: Found 15 teal/cyan elements and 6 orange elements

design_successes.success: Hogwarts logo correctly displayed in navbar
design_successes.details: Logo loads from correct URL and displays properly

design_successes.success: Lightning bolt decorations visible and animated
design_successes.details: Found 4 lightning bolt decorations with proper animations

passed_tests: Homepage loads with teal/cyan/orange color theme (15 teal/cyan + 6 orange elements)
Logo displayed correctly in navbar with proper Hogwarts branding
Homepage shows ALL 6 services (not just 3) - confirmed 6 service cards
Services page displays with correct alternating colors
About page shows founder Leo Celestine section with correct IMDb link
Lightning bolt decorations visible and animated (4 found)
Admin registration page exists and loads properly
Basic booking form fields present (name, email, phone)
Responsive design maintains quality across viewport sizes

critical_fixes: Fix /api/auth/me endpoint 500 error - likely ObjectId serialization issue
Implement proper 3-step booking form with step indicators and navigation
Fix service dropdown population in booking form
Add Next/Continue buttons for booking form step progression
admin_setup: Complete admin registration by accessing OTP email for leocelestine.s@gmail.com
Test admin dashboard functionality once admin is properly registered
recommendations: Consider using UUIDs instead of ObjectIds for better JSON serialization
Add proper error handling for booking form validation
Implement booking form state management for multi-step process
